sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Confirm delete operation
sect1.para: This page confirms deletion of a process.
If you click "Yes", will be deleted all processes that have the same name of the process. This deletion cannot be undone.

simplelist.member: To confirm delete operation click "Yes". This will delete all process that have the same name of the process and will go the processes list page.
To cancel delete operation click "No". This will go to the previous page.
